> 1. Write down 3 most important things for you in 30 sec. Happiness, Family, my personal value > > 2. If you win a miliion dollars, what you do ? I will go back to school. Specialize in entertainment industry > > 3. If there are no constraints such as money, time, ethic, what do you want to do ? I want to be the best stroage specialist there is or movie director > > 4. If you have 2 months to live, how do you spend your remaining ? I will write my memoir for my children
Tip : Time Management - have the clear idea what one wants to do - come up with detail plan - prepare daily list of things to do - don't do the items not in one's daily list - understand 80:20 percent rule 20 % of items in one's list have 80 % of one's work - have daily list if items are done, put remaining ones to one's next list ps : Persons without daily list can't be high deliver achiver.
